message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe will be highly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm proposing an initial offer of $1,400,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking of a price more in the range of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, I believe the value this product brings to the table is closer to my initial offer. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,350,000. This reflects a fair compromise considering its potential benefits.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above your new offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a price of $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value I see in the product.
